N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 381.1 - Purpose and scope

State Regulations

The purpose of these regulations is to establish transport
permit standards for transporters of low-level radioactive waste (LLRW) and
standards for generators and transporters relating to the use of the low-level
radioactive waste manifest system and its recordkeeping requirements. An LLRW
manifest document and the New York State LLRW transport permit must accompany
all shipments of low-level radioactive waste while in transit into, through or
within New York State unless specifically exempted under this Part. The
manifest document will serve as a multipurpose instrument to be used for
tracking, auditing and enforcement. Notes
